'''Born of Ocean Swell''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] in [[Version 3.8]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2023-07-05 11:00:00 UTC+8 &ndash; 2023-07-25 17:59:59

===Summary===
* During this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Dance of the Shimmering Wave" [[Eula]] ({{Cryo}}) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* During this event wish, the 4-star characters "Coordinates of Clear Frost" [[Mika]] ({{Cryo}}), "Wolf Boy" [[Razor]] ({{Electro}}), and "Protector From Afar" [[Thoma]] ({{Pyro}}) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
